sentences.en: "Actually, most of my tennis is at club level," he admitted.
sentences.cn: “说实话，我的网球基本上属于业余水平，”他承认说。

sentences.en: He spent hours throwing a tennis ball against a wall.
sentences.cn: 他好几个小时都对着一堵墙掷网球。

sentences.en: I also enjoy windsurfing, tennis, racquetball, swimming, you name it.
sentences.cn: 我也喜欢帆板、网球、短柄墙球、游泳等等，不一而足。

sentences.en: I like his smile and his tennis!
sentences.cn: 我喜欢他的微笑和他的网球！

sentences.en: If she decides to go with her sister instead, then I can play tennis with you.
sentences.cn: 要是她决定和她姐姐一起出去，那我就能和你去打网球。

sentences.en: Kournikova is poised to rewrite the tennis history books.
sentences.cn: 库尔尼科娃决心改写网球史。

sentences.en: Mind trainers are now part of a tennis star's retinue.
sentences.cn: 现在，网球明星的随行人员中有些是心理培训师。

sentences.en: Modern tennis rackets are now apparently 20 per cent lighter.
sentences.cn: 现代的网球拍据说比以前的轻20%。

sentences.en: My hobbies are letter writing, foot-ball, music, photography, and tennis.
sentences.cn: 我的业余爱好是写信、踢足球、听音乐、玩摄影和打网球。

sentences.en: She excels all of us at tennis.
sentences.cn: 她的网球比我们打得都好。

sentences.en: The Lawn Tennis Association suspended Mr Castle from the British team.
sentences.cn: 草地网球协会暂停了卡斯尔先生在英国队的职务。

sentences.en: The palace has extensive gardens, a maze, and tennis courts.
sentences.cn: 这座宫殿有几座大花园、一处迷宫和几个网球场。

sentences.en: The tennis star has parted company with his Austrian trainer.
sentences.cn: 这位网球明星与他的奥地利教练分道扬镳。

sentences.en: The wheelchair tennis player is allowed two bounces of the ball.
sentences.cn: 轮椅网球选手可以等球落地两次再击球。

sentences.en: There is very little to choose between the world's top tennis players.
sentences.cn: 世界顶级网球运动员之间往往难分伯仲。

sentences.en: They often tennis in the afternoon.
sentences.cn: 他们常在下午打网球。

sentences.en: To stay fit off season, I play tennis or football.
sentences.cn: 为了在休赛期间保持状态，我常打网球或踢足球。

sentences.en: Try tennis, badminton or windsurfing. In short, anything challenging.
sentences.cn: 试试网球、羽毛球或帆板运动吧。总之，只要是有挑战性的。

sentences.en: We definitely wanted to salvage some pride for British tennis.
sentences.cn: 我们当然想为英国网球挽回一些尊严。

sentences.en: We rank him among the best tennis players.
sentences.cn: 我们把他列入最优秀网球运动员之列。

phrases.tran_cn: 肘部发炎；网球运动员常见的肘伤

trans.tran_en: a game for two people or two pairs of people who use  rackets  to hit a small soft ball backwards and forwards over a net
